name: Executioner Must Be Present
description:
Your accomplice has been arrested! Sentenced to death!

The executioner is on his way, and the execution can only be executed if he is present!

Rescue your companions before the executioner arrives!

You can activate pre-buried explosives to create falling rocks to hinder the executioner,

But the police will also come with explosives to dismantle the rocks and shoot you!

WASD move, E or F to start explosives

Mouse Aim and Shoot

 Changelog:

v1.01: Fixed that enemy shoot has no collosion with obstacles

你的同伙被捕了！被判处死刑！

行刑官正在赶来的路上，只有他到场才能行刑！

要赶在行刑官到场之前救出同伴！

你可以启动事先埋好的炸药来制造落石阻碍行刑官的脚步,

但警方也会来装炸药拆除石头并射击你！

WASD移动，E或F启动炸药

鼠标瞄准射击

更新日志：

v1.01: 修复了敌人射击不会被障碍物阻挡的问题
